# Wordle Solver - ASP.NET Core Web Application

## Project Overview
This is a .NET Core web application that helps users solve Wordle puzzles by filtering possible words based on:
- Correct letters in correct positions (green)
- Correct letters in wrong positions (yellow)
- Excluded letters (gray)

## Technology Stack
- ASP.NET Core 8.0 (or latest LTS)
- Razor Pages
- C#
- Bootstrap for UI styling

## Project Structure
- Pages/ - Razor Pages for UI
- Models/ - Data models and word filtering logic
- wwwroot/ - Static files (CSS, JS)
- Data/ - Word list dictionary

## Development Guidelines
- Use clean, maintainable C# code
- Follow ASP.NET Core best practices
- Implement efficient word filtering algorithms
- Ensure responsive UI design
